scripts.bigboy: bun run validate && bun run d12-bigboy
scripts.validate: bun i && tsgo --noEmit && bun test --coverage --coverage-reporter=lcov --only-failures && bun run format
scripts.watcher: bun i && bun tsgo --noEmit --pretty && bun test --coverage --coverage-reporter=lcov --only-failures --bail && bun run format --colors=force
